title: Wight

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you successfully kill a kill-capable player, you will increase your attack tier to Powerful.
-If you are attacked and survive by any means, your Attack is reduced to Basic.

desc:
Post 573
-Use the factional kill to drain a target’s life during the night, dealing an attack to them.
-Decay a player’s defenses. For this night and the next, their defense is 1 tier lower than what it should be.
